definitions.definition: The act of chewing; mastication with the mouth.
examples: I popped the gum into my mouth and gave it a chew .

definitions.definition: A small sweet , such as a taffy , that is eaten by chewing.
examples: Phillip purchased a bag of licorice chews at the drugstore.
The school had banned chew and smokes from the school grounds, even for adults.

definitions.definition: A plug or wad of chewing tobacco; chaw or a chaw.
examples: The ballplayers sat on the bench watching the rain, glumly working their chews .
The first time he chewed tobacco, he swallowed his chew and got extremely sick.

definitions.definition: The condition of something being torn or ground up mechanically.

main_definition: The act of chewing; mastication with the mouth.
secondary_definitions: A small sweet , such as a taffy , that is eaten by chewing.
( countable ) A plug or wad of chewing tobacco; chaw or a chaw.
( uncountable , informal ) The condition of something being torn or ground up mechanically.
